Parameters.desc: List of SphereFadeGizmo plugins that will limit the rendering volume
The color to render outside the gizmo volume
Whether the alpha channel is affected
Falloff factor for smooth transition between the inside and outside volume
Determine how the falloff parameter is interpreted. (0: Min dimension, 1: Max dimension, 2: Absolute)

The legacy mode is used for full compatibility with pre-falloff-type support'. In this mode the falloff value is a percentage of the radius.
 For box gizmo : 
    legacy mode==1 --> 'radius' = half the side dimension and all sides are equal (i.e. w==h==l). Length or height parameter on the gizmo are discarded. 
    legacy mode==0 --> 'radius' = box width (x axis), 'length' = box length (y axis), 'height' = box height (z axis). 
 For cylinder gizmo :     legacy mode==1 --> height = diameter (i.e. 2*radius). The cylinder height is oriented toward the Y axis. 
    legacy mode==0 --> 'radius' = cylinder radius, 'height' = cylinder height. The cylinder height is oriented toward the Z axis.
